Text: Love seeing OOTP get some attention here. Thanks :)

Thank you for this and all the work you did last year.

I didn't notice right off that you did the two Wolverine Studios games. I appreciate those too. I think they released the final version of their College Basketball V2 game and the new version of their Pro Basketball game will be out May 1st, according to them.

I think a lot of us that couldn't afford simulators, but that love them really appreciate what you did over this past year. It isn't a community that gets much notice, but the number of people downloading your two new OOTP releases seems to have increased a lot over last year. I think you are drawing more people in. :) Most were probably too depressed to even look around for a cracked version prior to last year, so now they are taking notice.
thank you!
OOTP 13.x global patch is now out.  - http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7178288
Second all that's been said. Thanks for the great work!

Once I try and use the crack I am getting a system error saying " The program can't start because LIBMYSQL.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem. When I do that it gives me the same thing. Can you please help?
Yeah never download from Anonymous

Detroitrob, when you get errors like that, Google the file or the message and it will tell you how to fix the problem. Usually you can add the files/dependencies in yourself. This is more of an issue of stuff missing off your computer.

Sparker781, you are of course free to not download it, but this is the same guy who was doing this last year. You can always check files yourself, for any malware or whatever. If you can take the time to comment like that, then you can take the time to check the files as well.

To all,

sparker781 is a quart low. This game is CLEAN and one of the best sports sims we have.

Thanks again, [SoN]

Hey guys, I'm still at a loss of how to install OOTP13. I read all the comments, and I still can't figure out what to do. I have the crack (lol) and I tried dragging and dropping it over the top of the OOTp13 Setup folder. I tried installing it and putting in the serial number, but it's still not working. Any help would be lovely.
I can't get this to work. :(

@Favre999 run the setup exe that comes in this torrent. Once it is installed, copy the ootp13.exe file into the installed folder. (c:program filesout of the park developmentootp13 - or wherever you installed it to). It should ask if you want to overwrite the ootp13.exe that is already there. Say yes. Then you can run it and enter a serial.
keeps asking for serial? wtf where do i get one? am i missing something?
It wont let me open the crack. its keeps saying "This application has failed to start because LIBMYSQL.dll was not found. Re-installin the application may fix this problem." Anyway i could fix this?

seanpgh,

Any number will do. Our hero [SoN] recommends "1" without the quotes.
Any chance for the new update?

ootpfan04: The global patch should cover it for you. Just update the game like normal (grab the patch from the official website) and then crack it with this patch - http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7178288

Did you apply the SoN patch again after the update installed? It seems to work just fine on the few computers I know it's been tested on.

jasander76: I suggest you use the global patch but if you are going to use this one, just install the game as normal from the ootp13setup.exe file. Then you will copy the ootp13.exe from the crack folder you downloaded here and overwrite the ootp13.exe that installed when you ran the setup. then you open the game and enter any serial number (as stated above, the number 1 works fine) and that is it. I'm not sure how to explain it any better so good luck.
